ESSER.SkillsHint: Adjust bonuses and click the die to roll when adventure calls.
ESSER.AttributesHint: Assign your core strengths, then choose a training level for each linked skill.
ESSER.NotesPlaceholder: Background beats, allies, goals, scars, and reminders all live here.
ESSER.PortraitPromptHint: Paste an image URL or upload a file to represent your character.

ESSER.AttributeDescription.might: Strength, endurance, and prowess in melee challenges.
ESSER.AttributeDescription.agility: Dexterity, speed, stealth, and ranged attacks.
ESSER.AttributeDescription.mind: Intelligence, lore mastery, survival, and spellcraft.
ESSER.AttributeDescription.charm: Persuasion, trickery, animal bonds, and social presence.
